name: Ferrari F40
description: Starts and runs well, but with slight overheating issues

name: Porsche Ferdinand
description: Extremely rare! Transmission broken, has not run at all for 75 years, previously owned by famous Austrian painter.

name: Reliant Robin
description: Previously owned by elderly gentleman, runs perfectly, but has slight body damage.

name: Porsche Carrera GT
description: Found in perfect condition in an oil sheiks garden. Car can at times randomly steer towards trees. Please excercise caution when driving.

name: Honda Civic
description: Runs smoothly, has aftermarket bodykit, spoiler, exhaust for extra horse power

name: Toyota Supra
description: 'Dude is that a Supra?' Yes, and you want it.
